languages.text: "Планета хиреет, но вы обратили внимание на ее проблемы, только когда смогли сделать из них развлечение. Вложение Империума поселенцами окупится только за несколько веков, если, конечно, Кетца Темер вообще сможет приносить десятину со своим захолустным статусом".

"The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."
languages.original_text: "Планета хиреет, но вы обратили внимание на ее проблемы, только когда смогли сделать из них развлечение. Вложение Империума поселенцами окупится только за несколько веков, если, конечно, Кетца Темер вообще сможет приносить десятину со своим захолустным статусом".

traits.locale_text: "The planet is withering, and yet you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to turn them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — if Quetza Temer will ever be able to pay tithes at all in its wretched status, that is."

At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — if Quetza Temer will ever be able to pay tithes at all in its wretched status, that is."

At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

languages.text: “这颗行星正在枯萎，但你却不肯正视它的问题，反而把它变成了你的个人游乐场。如果继续这样下去，帝国恐怕要等上几百年，才能收回殖民工作付出的资源。这还有个前提，假设格扎尔特默这个处境堪忧的地方真的能缴纳什一税。”
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: “这颗行星正在枯萎，但你却不肯正视它的问题，反而把它变成了你的个人游乐场。如果继续这样下去，帝国恐怕要等上几百年，才能收回殖民工作付出的资源。这还有个前提，假设格扎尔特默这个处境堪忧的地方真的能缴纳什一税。”

languages.text: «El planeta se marchita, pero solo dirigió su atención a los problemas tras encontrar una forma de entretenerse con ellos. A este ritmo, pasarán siglos hasta que la inversión del Imperium en forma de colonos sea rentable, y eso suponiendo que Quetza Temer pueda superar su lamentable estado y pagar diezmos en algún momento».
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: «El planeta se marchita, pero solo dirigió su atención a los problemas tras encontrar una forma de entretenerse con ellos. A este ritmo, pasarán siglos hasta que la inversión del Imperium en forma de colonos sea rentable, y eso suponiendo que Quetza Temer pueda superar su lamentable estado y pagar diezmos en algún momento».

languages.text: « La planète est en péril, mais vous n'avez commencé à vous intéresser à ses problèmes qu'une fois que vous avez trouvé moyen d'en faire une source de divertissement. À ce rythme, il faudra des siècles pour que l'investissement de l'Imperium dans cette colonie soit rentabilisé. Et encore, pour cela, il faudrait que Quetza Temer soit en mesure de verser sa part de dîme malgré ces conditions catastrophiques. »
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: « La planète est en péril, mais vous n'avez commencé à vous intéresser à ses problèmes qu'une fois que vous avez trouvé moyen d'en faire une source de divertissement. À ce rythme, il faudra des siècles pour que l'investissement de l'Imperium dans cette colonie soit rentabilisé. Et encore, pour cela, il faudrait que Quetza Temer soit en mesure de verser sa part de dîme malgré ces conditions catastrophiques. »

languages.text: 「この惑星は枯れ果てつつある。それなのに、お前たちがその問題に目を向けたのは、それを娯楽のネタにできると気づいた時だけだった。今のままでは、帝国が入植者に投資した成果が現れるのは何世紀も先のことになるだろう。ケツァ・テメルがこの悲惨な状態から十分に回復して租税を納められるようになるかどうかさえ怪しい」
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: 「この惑星は枯れ果てつつある。それなのに、お前たちがその問題に目を向けたのは、それを娯楽のネタにできると気づいた時だけだった。今のままでは、帝国が入植者に投資した成果が現れるのは何世紀も先のことになるだろう。ケツァ・テメルがこの悲惨な状態から十分に回復して租税を納められるようになるかどうかさえ怪しい」

languages.text: "Gezegen solup gidiyor ve sen ancak onun sorunlarını bir eğlence kaynağına dönüştürdüğünde dikkatini verdin. Bu hızla İmparatorluk'un kolonicilere yaptığı yatırımın karşılığını vermesi yüzyıllar alacak. Quetza Temer'in bu perişan hâline rağmen aşar ödeyebileceğini varsayarsak tabii."
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: "Gezegen solup gidiyor ve sen ancak onun sorunlarını bir eğlence kaynağına dönüştürdüğünde dikkatini verdin. Bu hızla İmparatorluk'un kolonicilere yaptığı yatırımın karşılığını vermesi yüzyıllar alacak. Quetza Temer'in bu perişan hâline rağmen aşar ödeyebileceğini varsayarsak tabii."

languages.text: "Der Planet verwelkt, und dennoch habt Ihr Euch erst dann seinen Problemen gewidmet, als Ihr eine Möglichkeit gefunden hattet, daraus eine Quelle der Unterhaltung zu machen. In diesem Tempo wird es Jahrhunderte dauern, bis die Investition des Imperiums an Kolonisten sich auszahlt – sofern Quetza Temer in seinem erbarmungswürdigen Zustand überhaupt jemals den Zehnt bezahlen kann."
languages.original_text: "The planet is withering, and yet, you only turned your attention to its problems once you had found a way to make them into a source of entertainment. At this rate, it will be centuries before the Imperium's investment of colonists pays off — assuming Quetza Temer is ever able to pay tithes at all in its wretched state."

traits.locale_text: "Der Planet verwelkt, und dennoch habt Ihr Euch erst dann seinen Problemen gewidmet, als Ihr eine Möglichkeit gefunden hattet, daraus eine Quelle der Unterhaltung zu machen. In diesem Tempo wird es Jahrhunderte dauern, bis die Investition des Imperiums an Kolonisten sich auszahlt – sofern Quetza Temer in seinem erbarmungswürdigen Zustand überhaupt jemals den Zehnt bezahlen kann."
